item.description:
UPDATE! We've got about 35 people from all three groups.  I will organize people into teams of 6.  If you are late, you may not be able to get on a team, so please try to be prompt.  All are welcome to come and enjoy, even if you don't want to enter the competition.

=========================--

Jeff at The North Star has invited us on Tuesday, October 23 at 6:00pm to the Annual Great Pumpkin Carving Contest at The North Star.

Who will win the "Bobbing for Nips" Contest?

Isabel has cross listed this with several groups and has about 30 RSVPs!

ABOUT THE RED SOX NATIVES: The Red Sox Natives organized weekly Patriots viewing parties last year with guests from several other invited groups attending. We had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

The North Star will be our Primary Home for watching 2012 New England Patriots games (as well as hosting Trivingo).

ABOUT THE NORTH STAR: The North Star is super conveniently located next to the TD Garden and on the Green and Orange Lines and Commuter Rail at North Station. The Red and Blue Lines are within a 10 minute walk and street parking is also available if you arrive early.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO AND TIP YOUR SERVER.

We hope to see you there.

Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Jeff and location of other Natives
item.name: Great Pumpkin Carving Contest at North Star
